question: The speed of the current is 5 km/hr. A motorboat goes 10 km upstream and back again to the starting point in 50 minutes. The speed (in km/hr) of the motorboat in still water is :
explanation:
Let the speed of motorboat in still water be x km/hr. 
$latex \\therefore \\frac{10}{x-5}+\\frac{10}{x+5} = \\frac{50}{60}&s=1$
$latex => 10\\left ( \\frac{x+5+x-5}{(x+5)(x-5)} \\right )= \\frac{5}{6}&s=1$
$latex => 20x\\times 6 = (x^{2}-25)\\times 5$
$latex => x^{2}-24x-25 = 0$
$latex => x^{2}-25x+x-25 = 0$
$latex => x(x-25)+1(x-25)= 0$
$latex => (x-25)(x+1) = 0$
$latex => x = 25$
Hence speed of motorboat in still water is 25 km/hr.
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
